bug.author: BUAAtao
bug.description:
When training my own dataset, I found that gt boxes didn't match labels. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35003533/86425256-3b006300-bd17-11ea-8a4a-541f081504a3.jpg></denchmark-link>
if added "--rect" when training my own dataset, train_batch*.jpg were correct. I don't know why this happened? I have the same problem in yolov3. And I found if used the yolov3 from three months ago, there are no problems. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35003533/86425201-14dac300-bd17-11ea-8d52-5b6873df6e95.jpg></denchmark-link>

comments.comment:
Hello <denchmark-link:https://github.com/BUAAtao>@BUAAtao</denchmark-link> , thank you for your interest in our work! Please visit our <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/wiki/Train-Custom-Data>Custom Training Tutorial</denchmark-link> to get started, and see our <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/blob/master/tutorial.ipynb>Jupyter Notebook</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://colab.research.google.com/github/ultralytics/yolov5/blob/master/tutorial.ipynb></denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://hub.docker.com/r/ultralytics/yolov5>Docker Image</denchmark-link> , and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/wiki/GCP-Quickstart>Google Cloud Quickstart Guide</denchmark-link> for example environments. If this is a bug report, please provide screenshots and minimum viable code to reproduce your issue, otherwise we can not help you. If this is a custom model or data training question, please note that Ultralytics does not provide free personal support. As a leader in vision ML and AI, we do offer professional consulting, from simple expert advice up to delivery of fully customized, end-to-end production solutions for our clients, such as:
Cloud-based AI systems operating on hundreds of HD video streams in realtime. Edge AI integrated into custom iOS and Android apps for realtime 30 FPS video inference. Custom data training, hyperparameter evolution, and model exportation to any destination.
For more information please visit <denchmark-link:https://www.ultralytics.com>https://www.ultralytics.com</denchmark-link> .

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/BUAAtao>@BUAAtao</denchmark-link> follow the formatting of coco128 and everything should work fine. See <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/wiki/Train-Custom-Data>https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/wiki/Train-Custom-Data</denchmark-link>

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/BUAAtao>@BUAAtao</denchmark-link> did you get this resolved? This may occur if you have extra images in your images folder or if you change your data after it has been cached into *.npy files. See <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/issues/306>#306</denchmark-link>
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
